Name: Gan's Matchstick Men：Deadly Rhythm
About the game: Stickman Deadly Rhythm is a local multiplayer fighting game. Use strange mechanics to blow your opponents. Fight your friends and blow them away happily! WuHu！ Local 1-2 player game (note that multiplayer online is not supported yet) Unique 2D platform sword halberd fighting (currently rare 2D combat mechanism) Inspire a tense fighting atmosphere The operation is simple and easy to use, even if you have never played it before, you can quickly join the game 4 game modes and 5 selectable skills
